about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My journey: from engineering to web development
about.text: My name is Jefferson Wellington Bonfim Rizzetto, and I am a front-end developer with a solid technical background and hands-on experience building web applications. I hold a degree in Electrical Engineering and began my professional career working with technology and computer maintenance. Over the years, I have also worked in roles that required strong analytical skills, including government sales, commercial communication, and engineering as a technical lead. In 2024, I decided to fully transition my career into software development, combining logic, creativity, and problem-solving. Since then, I have been specializing in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, while also developing practical projects that integrate front-end with back-end using Node.js and MySQL databases. Currently, I am seeking my first opportunity as a front-end developer, where I can apply my knowledge, continue to grow technically, and contribute to well-structured, high-performance products focused on user experience.

skills.textDev: Building responsive websites and modern applications with a focus on performance and best practices.
skills.textDesign: Designing intuitive interfaces and experiences that keep the user at the center.
skills.textInt: Developing integrated applications using REST APIs, authentication, data consumption, and database communication.

section.title: Featured
section.description: Here are some of the projects I have developed over the past months. Each project was carefully built with attention to detail, performance, and a strong focus on user experience.

blogApp.title: Full Stack Blog App
blogApp.description: A full stack blog application with JWT authentication, complete CRUD for posts, categories, protected routes, and a rich text editor. Project focused on real-world frontend-backend integration and architecture.

bookShop.title: Full Stack Book Shop
bookShop.description: A complete book management system with create, edit, list, and delete features. Production-ready project with integrated frontend, backend, and database.

postSystem.title: Full Stack Post System
postSystem.description: A full stack application with authentication, authorization, posts, comments, and likes. Each user manages only their own content. Project focused on logic, security, and real deployment.

movieList.title: Movie List App
movieList.description: A React application for listing movies using The Movie Database API. Includes search, favorites, and dynamic page navigation.
